CustomField.description: This field allows you to specify a backup admin approver at the process level instead of the default system wide level that is assigned to requests that have an invalid or deactivated approver.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field allows you to specify a backup admin approver at the process level instead of the default system wide level that is assigned to requests that have an invalid or deactivated approver.
CustomField.label: Backup Admin User
